name: Gather Journal - Back Issues
description:
A recipe-driven magazine dedicated to the aspects of gathering : to dine, drink, harvest, and cook. Designed to inspire and to last. Current Issue 4 - Fall/Winter 2014 - takes its cues from the word Cocoon. You’ll find recipes that impart a warm, cozy, and, well, cocoon-like feeling, and ones that visually mimic its wrapped and bundled form Issue 3 - Spring/Summer 2013 - the “Rough Cut” issue, focuses its attention on film, specifically, Gather's favorite summer movies. The recipes created to evoke them are, like those films, meant to be something you will want to revisit again and again Click drop down menu for available back issues Made in the USA
tags: Magazine, Periodical, Reading, Cook, Cookbook, Kitchen, America, Gift

name: Palomino Blackwing Pearl Pencils
description:
The Palomino Blackwing Pearl is the latest addition to the Blackwing family Featuring a pearl white finish, black imprint and eraser, and a balanced and smooth graphite core that is softer than the graphite found in the Palomino Blackwing 602, but firmer than the graphite found in the Palomino Blackwing The unique and iconic ferrule allows you to extend and replace its eraser after extensive use and even "hack" your pencil to give it a custom look with replacements in a variety of colors Each box contains 12 balanced and smooth premium graphite pencils, crafted from Genuine Incense-cedar ➳More Palomino brand products... Made in Japan
tags: Pencil, Office, Desk, Writing, Gift, Abroad, Imported, Hostess

name: Paper Twine Bobbins
description:
Paper Twine by Paperphine on reclaimed silk bobbins Perfect for gift wrapping, decorations, craft projects, etc. Bobbins found in former weaving mills are about 4.3" tall + 3" in diameter, sizes can vary Available in two varieties: - White Medium Twine - about 3.8 oz / 480 yards - the most versatile strength paper twine for kitting, crochet, craft projects + fine gift wrapping - Colored Strong Twine - about 3.9 oz / 195 yards - a strong twine perfect for everyday use More great gifts for crafty friends Made in Austria

To protect fabric, try the original Otter Wax

name: Palomino Blackwing 602 Pencils
description:
The Palomino Blackwing 602 features a firm and smooth graphite core that is ideal for writers and everyday users Its firm, dark lead holds a point and lays down a line like no other pencil on the market, perfect for those marathon writing sessions Each box contains 12 firm and smooth premium graphite pencils, crafted from Genuine Incense-cedar Featuring a pearl grey finish, gold imprint and black eraser, and the firmest graphite core found in the Blackwing family of pencils including the Palomino Blackwing and Palomino Blackwing Pearl The unique and iconic ferrule allows you to extend and replace its eraser after extensive use and even "hack" your pencil to give it a custom look with replacements in a variety of colors Each box contains 12 firm and smooth premium graphite pencils, crafted from Genuine Incense-cedar ➳More Palomino brand products... Made in Japan
tags: Pencil, Office, Desk, Writing, Gift, Abroad, Imported, grey, gray

name: Palomino Blackwing Pencils
description:
A loving tribute to the Eberhardt-Faber Blackwing 602, a pencil that has sketched, written and composed its way across the American cultural landscape, this soft and smooth, luxury pencil the ideal gift for artists and musicians everywhere Featuring a matte black finish, gold imprint and white eraser, and the softest graphite core found in the Blackwing family of pencils including the Palomino Blackwing 602 and Palomino Blackwing Pearl The unique and iconic ferrule allows you to extend and replace its eraser after extensive use and even "hack" your pencil to give it a custom look with replacements in a variety of colors Each box contains 12 premium graphite pencils, crafted from Genuine Incense-cedar ➳More Palomino brand products... Made in Japan

name: Lollia Shea Handcremes
description:
Wander e. 1005 A floral escape for the romantic dreamer. Night blooming Jasmine and ancient Cypress adrift on moonlit paths of Water Lily and delicate, dew drenched greens. At Last No. 17 Soft and simply captivating. A light floral celebration of powdery rice flower perfectly paired with lovely southern magnolias and demure mimosa. Wish No. 22 Warm vanilla bean and rice flower delicately frosted with sugared pastille. Jasmine leaves sweetened with sugar cane. Comforting ylang ylang and the sheerest of amber woods complete the scene, creating the most luxurious of fragrant escapes. Breathe No. 19 A floral heart of ruffled peony and white lily with sheer hints of fresh grapefruit and orange. A fresh air impression infused with leafy green notes surrounded by a hint of cool, mossy forest paths. * Please note that you can find many more Lollia products like bubble bath, eau de parfum & salt sachets at our brick + mortar location * Made in the USA
Tags: Bath, Cream, Gift, Body, Home, ladies

Cold Horizon, Winter 2013, printed November 2013 - 3 Pack of Pocket Notebooks - 48-page memo books - measure 3-1/2" wide by 5-1/2" tall - bound with rugged three-staple saddle-stitch process - covers printed with the blue gradient and white text on a very glossy UV-coated 120-kb Appleton Utopia One stock. Arranged side by side, or back to back, the blues fade evenly from book to book. - inside covers feature white with the text printed in the same blue gradient as the outside covers - Inside pages Finch Opaque 50-kb text stock, tinted a different color in each book — light green, light blue, and cool gray — all with a light gray 3/16″ graph grid - COLORS limited-editions, are issued quarterly & tend to sell out quickly ➳ Check out these other selections available from the limited edition COLORS collection: Drink Local, Fall 2013 America the Beautiful, Spring 2013 Expedition, Winter 2012 "I'm not writing it down to remember it later, I'm writing it down to remember it now" Made in the USA
Tags: Office, Notepad, Notebook, Note, Paper, Gift, Stocking Stuffer, USA, America

name: Eggwhite + Chamomile Soap
description:
Fresh from the Belgian countryside and used by European women for centuries, Belgian Eggwhite Facial Soaps are produced with pure eggwhites, chamomile and lecithin Chamomile flowers (anthemis nobilis) create a totally natural softening agent used since ancient times for calming and conditioning the skin The oil's soothing and hydrating properties combined with the protein-rich power of fresh eggwhites maintains a clear, glowing complexion with daily use 1.8 oz Made in Belgium

name: DIY Knit Bangle Kit
description:
Fun + easy kit that comes with everything needed to make 6 chunky knit bangles to wear and give as gifts, no knitting skills required - Round 5.3" knitting loom - Knitting hook tool - Strong Paper Twine on 6 cardboard coils (18.6 yards each) with colors ranging from dusty + rustic to fiery + bright: - Coral/Salmon - Gray Blue - Light Smaragd (dusty green) - Fiery Red - Fiery Orange - Blue - Transparent Elastic Cord to adjust size - Tutorial for using the knitting loom, making the bangle, adjusting size + finishing touches - Postcard showing examples of finished bangles Packed in its own box for easy gift giving! We recommend you avoid contact with water, but Paper Twines are also used in carpets and have survived the washing machine. So probably no biggie. Made in Austria
tags: Paper, Twine, DIY, Kit, Make, Craft, Knit, Imported, Abroad, Gift

name: MT Washi Tape - Bengt + Lotta
description:
Patterned rolls of MT masking tape from the Summer 2013 designer series by Bengt + Lotta in Sweden - From the Japanese company which invented ‘washi’ rice paper masking tape - The semi-transparent tape is easily torn by hand and re-positionable - Add color anywhere from letters to gifts, walls to notebooks - Perfect little writing space to leave a happy note or label - Each roll is 10m long Three Swedish Patterns Available: Adam + Eve - 30mm wide Happy Moose - 15mm wide Tulip - 20mm wide ➳ Available in a variety of colors + patterns Made in Japan

description:

A replenishing pick-me-up, restorative Macadamia Nut and healing Avocado Oil infuse this unique formula with superior soothing power. Sublimely scented & irresistibly soft: sweet, silky joy is at hand! Individually packaged in a matching tin for easy gift-giving Forget-Me-Not: Osmanthus | Rice Powder | White Orchid True Vanilla: Bergamot | Dark Vanilla | Amber Willow + Water: Cut Greens | Flowering Lotus | Watercress 3.4oz / 96g Made in the USA Remaining Library of Flowers collection available exclusively in store

name: Serrote Notebooks
description:
Limited edition letterpress notebooks produced on vintage Heidelberg Windmill presses by Serrote, a Lisbon based couple, Nuno Neves and Susana Vilela - Dimensions: 6.7 " x 4.5" - Cover: white paper 250g - 40 double sided pages per notebook No. 26 - Tablecloth: Letterpress, good food and the luxury of a paper tablecloth, united to result in the Tablecloth Notebook - Printed in two colors in letterpress in Sintra, Portugal, in May 2012 - Bookblock: tablecloth textured paper 60g (see photo inset for detail) - Limited edition: 2000 numbered copies No. 24 - Biscuit: For those who are fond of biscuits, and never refuse an arrowroot cookie with the afternoon tea. The cover was printed in letterpress, the cookie dots on the inside were printed in offset - Printed in two colors in letterpress in Lisbon, Portugal, in November 2010 - Bookblock: yellow ochre paper 80g pattern printed in offset - Limited edition: 2500 copies No. 27 - Bookkeeping: The best way to keep your household accounts spotlessly organized, using a Bookkeeping notebook entirely printed in letterpress - Printed in two colors in letterpress in Lisbon, Portugal, in June 2012. - Bookblock: white paper 80g , red lines printed in letterpress - Limited edition: 2000 numbered copies Made in Portugal

description:

name: Postcard of the Month Set
description:
This fun postcard set features 12 drawings by Eun-Ha Paek of the artist collective Milky Elephant There are a variety of whimsical images with fantastical creatures in settings ranging from coral reefs to Chinese forests, rainforests to a fast-moving city. There's a postcard to cover any myriad of emotions and seasons and this set is great for keeping the written word alive. - Printed with vegetable-based inks on 100% post-consumer recycled paper in Hayward, CA - Postcards measure 4" x 6", full-color on the front, one-color on the back - The set of 12 postcards comes packaged in a 100% biodegradable sleeve Made in the USA

name: DIY Paper Circles Kit
description:
Paper Circles for garlands + party decorations, to brighten up your windows, homes + studios or to make fantastic gift wrappings are easy and fun to make with this DIY kit The distinctive patterning of the colored paper circles is thanks to Paperphine's special super thick paper twines being dyed only after the spinning process You can make 45 small or 23 big circles (or a mixture of sizes) Diameter of circles: 2.7 " (small) / 5.3 " (big) Kit Includes: - 6 Colors of paper twine - (0.55 yards each) in white, red, blue, green, magenta and brown - Tutorial - 11 yards of medium white paper twine - Postcard showing completed decoration Packed in a kraft paper stand-up resealable bag - making it a wonderful gift for your DIY friends! Try supplementing your kit with Twisted Paper Twine + make some striped paper circles! Made in Austria
tags: Paper, Twine, Circles, Decoration, DIY, Kit, Imported, Abroad, Gift, Make, Craft, ladies
